des: "A very tasty drink, good for summer outings.  The Cactus Cooler tastes more like fruit juice than an alcoholic beverage.  Quite intoxicating -- make sure to designate a driver."
ins: Fill a tumbler glass with ice cubes. Pour in the schnapps, rum, and pineapple juice. Add enough cranberry juice to turn the drink from yellow-orange to a salmon pink color.
